title: Chettinad-style Split-Level 5BHK Cottage Floor Plan Design for a 100x100 Feet Plot
description: A detailed JSON representation of a floor plan designed in Chettinad style, split-level layout for a 5-bedroom cottage (5BHK) on a 100x100 feet plot. The design includes floor-to-ceiling windows and spacious balconies for each bedroom, ensuring adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Central living area with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and an open plan layout. Designed following Vastu principles for communal harmony.
Adjacent dining space with seating arrangements. Vastu alignment ensures energy flow from the entrance to the dining area.
Fully equipped modern kitchen. Located in the northeast corner as per Vasti guidelines to harness positive energies.
Cozy family room offering a warm ambience and integrated with indoor-outdoor connectivity via a sliding glass door.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to welcome positive energies while adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a panoramic view. Spacious balcony adjoining the room for relaxation.
Second bedroom featuring similar design elements as above with enhanced privacy and ample natural light.
Third bedroom optimized for space and comfort. Includes a balcony for ventilation and sunlight.
Fourth bedroom designed with an emphasis on privacy while incorporating Vastu principles to ensure calm energy flow.
Fifth bedroom, the master suite, boasting a larger balcony and enhanced natural lighting. Placed strategically as per Vastu guidelines for optimal relaxation.

openings.description: Balcony access to each bedroom ensuring ample outdoor exposure and adherence to Vastu energy flow.
